policies.title: POLICIES AND TERMS
policies.termsText1: By making a purchase at LIMIT√ò, you accept the following terms and conditions of sale in accordance with Colombian legislation.
policies.termsText2: Legal Name: LIMIT√ò is a registered trademark operating under Colombian e-commerce laws.
policies.termsText3: Products: All products are subject to availability. Images are for reference and may vary slightly from the final product.
policies.retractionText1: According to the Colombian Consumer Statute, you have the right to withdraw from your purchase within 5 business days following receipt of the product, without justification.
policies.retractionItem1: The product must be unused, with original tags and in its original packaging
policies.retractionItem2: You must notify us by email at hola@limito.co
policies.retractionItem3: Return costs are borne by the buyer
policies.retractionItem4: Refund will be processed within 30 business days
policies.shippingCoverage: Coverage: We ship throughout Colombian territory.
policies.shippingTime1: Bogot√° and main cities: 3-5 business days
policies.shippingTime2: Rest of the country: 5-8 business days
policies.shippingCosts: Costs: Shipping cost is calculated at checkout based on delivery address.
policies.shippingText: Shipments are made through certified carriers. You will receive a tracking number once your order is dispatched.
policies.returnsDefective: Defective products: If you receive a product with manufacturing defects, contact us within 48 hours of receipt.
policies.returnsExchange: Size or color exchanges: We accept exchanges within 5 business days, provided the product is unused and with original tags.
policies.returnsStep1: Send an email to hola@limito.co with your order number and reason
policies.returnsStep2: Wait for our confirmation and authorization
policies.returnsStep3: Send the product to the address we will provide
policies.returnsStep4: Once received and verified, we will process the exchange or refund
policies.paymentText: We accept the following payment methods:
policies.paymentSecurity: All payments are processed securely. We do not store banking information on our servers.
policies.dataText: In accordance with Law 1581 of 2012 on Personal Data Protection of Colombia, your data will be treated confidentially and used only for:
policies.dataUse2: Send communications about your purchase status
policies.dataRights: You have the right to know, update, rectify and delete your personal data by contacting us at hola@limito.co.
policies.contactText: For any inquiry, complaint or request related to our policies:
policies.contactHours: Business hours: Monday to Friday, 9:00 AM - 6:00 PM (Colombia time)

success.title: Payment Successful!

declined.title: Payment Declined
declined.message: Your payment could not be processed. Please try again.

error.title: Payment Error
error.message: An error occurred processing your payment. Contact support if the problem persists.
